meta.title: Jesus Near – Find Christ Closer
meta.description: Jesus Near is a multilingual Christian resource to help you grow in faith, prayer, and understanding of the Gospel.
meta.ogDescription: Multilingual Christian articles and resources to deepen your walk with Jesus Christ.

jesus.metaTitle: Who Is Jesus Christ? Teachings, Life, and Relationship
jesus.metaDescription: Discover the identity, teachings, miracles, and parables of Jesus Christ. Learn how to build a personal relationship with Him and explore His life and legacy.
jesus.title: Jesus Christ
jesus.explore: Explore the person and teachings of Jesus
jesus.description: Explore the life and message of Jesus Christ—His identity, miracles, teachings, and parables. Learn how His life shapes our faith and how we can grow in relationship with Him today.
jesus.imageAlt: Jesus Christ depicted teaching the crowd

bible.metaTitle: Bible Study & Interpretation – Old and New Testament
bible.metaDescription: Understand the structure and message of the Bible. Study the Old and New Testaments, explore key biblical figures, and uncover the meaning behind Christian symbols.
bible.title: Bible
bible.explore: Explore the books and message of the Bible
bible.description: Dive into the Bible’s rich narrative—from Genesis to Revelation. Explore major biblical themes, characters, and how the Word of God speaks to us today through study and interpretation.
bible.imageAlt: Open Bible with sunlight shining on its pages

prayer.metaTitle: Prayer and Spiritual Growth – A Christian Guide
prayer.metaDescription: Grow your spiritual life through prayer, fasting, and inner healing. Learn how to develop a daily prayer habit and deepen your relationship with God.
prayer.title: Prayer & Spirituality
prayer.explore: Deepen your prayer and spiritual growth
prayer.description: Strengthen your spiritual journey through prayer, meditation, solitude, and inner healing. Discover practical guidance to grow closer to God each day.
prayer.imageAlt: Hands folded in prayer in soft candlelight

faith-in-life.metaTitle: Living Your Faith Daily – Family, Work, and Challenges
faith-in-life.metaDescription: Apply your faith to everyday life—family, work, finances, and trials. Find wisdom and strength to live as a Christian in every area of life.
faith-in-life.title: Faith in Daily Life
faith-in-life.explore: Live your faith in everyday life
faith-in-life.description: Faith is not just for Sundays. Discover how to live out your beliefs in daily life—from work and money to family and hardships—with Christian discipline and trust in God.
faith-in-life.imageAlt: Person walking down a path with sunrise ahead, symbolizing daily faith

verses.metaTitle: Bible Verses & Daily Scripture – Meaning, Context, Application
verses.metaDescription: Explore curated Bible verses by topic and season. Read each verse in context, discover cross-references, and learn how to apply God’s Word in daily life.
verses.title: Verses
verses.explore: Find Bible verses for every moment
verses.description: Discover carefully selected Scriptures organized by theme, occasion, and book. Each verse includes meaning, context, and practical reflection to help God’s Word speak into your day.
verses.imageAlt: Open Bible with a highlighted verse and bookmark

relationships.metaTitle: Christian Relationships – Marriage, Parenting, and Friendship
relationships.metaDescription: Explore Christian principles for healthy relationships—marriage, parenting, forgiveness, and community. Learn how to love and serve others with Christ-like compassion.
relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.description: Relationships are central to Christian living. Grow in love, forgiveness, and community through biblical guidance for marriage, parenting, and friendships.
relationships.imageAlt: Two people holding hands in a warm, supportive moment

meta.title: About Jesus Near & Dan – Bible Student Sharing Christ
meta.description: Discover how Dan, a disciple of Jesus with a passion for Scripture, curates multilingual Christian articles on JesusNear.com to help believers grow closer to Christ.
meta.ogDescription: Meet Dan, the steward of Jesus Near, who prayerfully shares Bible-centered articles in six languages.

hero.title: Rooted in Scripture, stewarded with prayer
hero.description: JesusNear.com is cared for by Dan — a follower of Jesus who spends every spare moment meditating on the Word, learning church history, and sharing Gospel hope. This space lets him offer Christ-centered insights in six languages so more people can love Jesus deeply.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of Dan studying the Bible while designing Jesus Near

highlights.title: Centered on Scripture
highlights.description: Teachings and reflections that keep the Gospel of Christ at the center.

highlights.title: Prayerful Stewardship
highlights.description: Content reviewed through devotion, accountability, and humble submission to Jesus.

highlights.title: Global Reach
highlights.description: Available in English, Español, Deutsch, Français, Português, and Русский.

mission.title: Why this simple mission exists
mission.description: Every article, translation, and visual aims to point hearts toward Jesus, explain Scripture clearly, and encourage daily discipleship.
list: Offer curated Bible teaching with the warmth of a personal mentor.
Blend diligent study with Spirit-led discernment before publishing.
Earn readers' trust through transparency, multilingual access, and careful sourcing.

dan.title: Meet Dan, the heart behind the site
dan.lead: Dan is a disciple of Jesus who spends his free hours studying the Bible, exploring church history, praying with friends, and practicing the teachings of Christ in everyday life.
details: Keeps Scripture study notes that become accessible reflections for others.
Believes theology is most credible when it is lived out in relationships and service.
Loves connecting believers with trusted teachers, local churches, and prayer partners.

values.title: Guiding values you can rely on
values.description: These principles shape every article, feature, and UI detail on Jesus Near.

items.title: Biblical Accuracy
items.description: Cross-checking verses, context, and references to keep teaching faithful.

items.title: Clarity & Beauty
items.description: Design and wording stay clean so the message of Christ shines.

items.title: Servant Leadership
items.description: Content is published to serve families, churches, and seekers — never to chase trends.

items.label: Listening
items.title: Learning and praying
items.description: Years of personal Bible study and prayer stirred Dan to share what he was learning.

items.label: Preparing
items.title: Designing the ministry path
items.description: Dan outlined topics, prayed for mentors, and translated resources so Jesus Near could serve several languages.

items.label: Serving
items.title: Publishing and refining
items.description: Today he keeps improving articles, visuals, and discoverability so more people receive trustworthy Christian resources.

trust.title: Built for trust
trust.description: From prayerful study to theological sources, nothing is rushed. Dan documents every change so readers know exactly who stands behind the words.
trust.quote: “I steward words the way I study the Bible: patiently, prayerfully, and with reverence for every detail.”
points: Original writing reviewed alongside Scripture references.
Transparent authorship — one steward who signs every update.
Secure infrastructure, privacy-minded analytics, and fast load times.

cta.title: Let’s stay in touch
cta.description: If you have a testimony, a suggestion, or need prayer, Dan would be honored to read your message.
